hints.content:
Jack has $\goldE{89}$ magic beans.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c42d62a1d7bcdaf7392775b7eac47e69d3287d21)

To subtract on the number line, we jump to the **left**.

He gave $\maroonD{32}$ magic beans to his sister.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8b2753cc23138e3338e31591114562565e9e6a00)

$\goldE{89} - \maroonD{32} = 57$

He gave $\purpleD{24}$ magic beans to his best friend.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/edae8627d36683414e43a244e56114b1a9516219)

$57 - \purpleD{24} =33$

Here is the correct number line:

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/d3103354808e4853ab23d692cd4b96c7d7ccfd17)

Jack has ${15}$ magic beans left.

question.content:
Jack had $89$ magic beans.  

He gave $32$ magic beans to his sister, $24$ to his best friend, and he planted $18$ magic beans.  

**Which number line shows how to find how many magic beans Jack has left?**  

[[☃ radio 2]]  

**How many magic beans does Jack have left?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] magic beans
